titles: To all Presbiterian [sic] ministers, who own themselves to be ministers of Christ's gospel, and say they suffer persecution for his names sake, to read and consider in this day, in which they may see themselves with the light within, and also measure themselves with their own rule the scriptures, I Cor. 9 14,16 ...
author: Wollrich, Humphry, 1633?-1707.
notes: Signed at end: Staffordshire, the 21st. day of the 7th. Month, 1662. Humphry Woolrich.
Dates given as they appear on the item.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
keywords: Society of Friends --  England --  Apologetic works.
